Title: Total Rickall
Writer: Justin Roiland (created by), Dan Harmon (created by), Mike McMahan, Mike McMahan (story editor), David Phillips (story editor), Matt Roller (story editor), Brian Wysol (story editor), Eric Acosta (staff writer), Tom Kauffman (staff writer), Wade Randolph (staff writer)
Actors: Justin Roiland, Chris Parnell, Spencer Grammer, Sarah Chalke
Plot: The Smith house is locked down after parasites threaten to take over the world by multiplying through flashbacks.
